name: Building a Simple Directive
description: In this lesson you will learn how to write a simple directive that displays a gravatar image for an email address.

name: Communicating Between AngularJS Components
description: In this lesson we are going to cover different ways to communicate between AngularJS components. When complete you will be able to use various patterns to send data and messages between AngularJS Controllers, Directives and Services.

name: Unit Testing Basics
description: In this lesson you will learn the basics of writing unit tests for AngularJS components.
